named-query.name: MGenericType.findGroupCode
named-query.query: SELECT m FROM MGenericType m WHERE m.id.groupCode = :groupCode ORDER BY m.displayOrder asc

named-query.name: MLoginIpAddr.findLoginIpAddrCheckFilter
named-query.query: SELECT m FROM MLoginIpAddr m WHERE m.id.corpId = :corpId AND ipAddress = :ipAddress AND loginPermitStatus = :loginPermitStatus AND delFlg = 0

named-query.name: MLoginIpAddr.findLoginIpAddrCheckFilterCorp
named-query.query: SELECT m FROM MLoginIpAddr m WHERE m.id.corpId = :corpId AND delFlg = 0

named-query.name: MLoginIpAddr.findLoginIpAddrCheckFilterStatus
named-query.query: SELECT m FROM MLoginIpAddr m WHERE m.id.corpId = :corpId AND loginPermitStatus = :loginPermitStatus AND delFlg = 0

named-query.name: TOshirase.findMenuOshiraseList
named-query.query: SELECT t FROM TOshirase t WHERE (t.targetCode = '1' OR (t.targetCode = '2' AND t.id.corpId =:corpId)) AND t.publishedStartDay <= CURRENT_DATE AND (t.publishedEndDay IS NULL OR CURRENT_DATE <= t.publishedEndDay) AND t.delFlg = 0 ORDER BY t.publishedStartDay DESC

named-query.name: TMaintenanceRequest.findJoinCountWithBuildingDivision
named-query.query: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT t) FROM TMaintenanceRequest t INNER JOIN t.TMaintenanceRequestHistories tmrh INNER JOIN tmrh.TMaintenanceFacilities tmf INNER JOIN tmf.MFacility mfc INNER JOIN mfc.TBuilding tb INNER JOIN tb.MPrefecture mp INNER JOIN tb.MCorp mc LEFT OUTER JOIN tb.TBuildingGroups tbg ON tbg.delFlg = 0 LEFT OUTER JOIN tbg.MChildGroup cg ON cg.delFlg = 0 LEFT OUTER JOIN cg.MParentGroup pg ON pg.delFlg = 0 WHERE (:maintenanceManageNo is null or t.maintenanceManageNo = :maintenanceManageNo) AND (:requestDateFrFlg is null or t.requestDate >= :requestDateFr) AND (:requestDateToFlg is null or t.requestDate <= :requestDateTo) AND (:executeDateFrFlg is null or t.executePlanStartDate >= :executeDateFr) AND (:executeDateToFlg is null or t.executePlanStartDate <= :executeDateTo) AND (:completionDateFrFlg is null or t.completionDate >= :completionDateFr) AND (:completionDateToFlg is null or t.completionDate <= :completionDateTo) AND (:requestStatusFlg is null or t.requestStatus IN :requestStatus) AND (:corpId is null or mc.corpId = :corpId) AND (:corpName is null or mc.corpName LIKE :corpName) AND (:corpIdOrName is null or mc.corpId LIKE :corpIdOrName or mc.corpName LIKE :corpIdOrName) AND (:buildingCorpId is null or tb.id.corpId = :buildingCorpId) AND (:buildingId is null or tb.id.buildingId = :buildingId) AND (:buildingNo is null or tb.buildingNo LIKE :buildingNo) AND (:buildingName is null or tb.buildingName LIKE :buildingName) AND (:divisionCorpId is null or tb.divisionCorpId = :divisionCorpId) AND (:divisionBuildingId is null or tb.divisionBuildingId = :divisionBuildingId) AND (:buildingNoOrName is null or tb.buildingNo LIKE :buildingNoOrName or tb.buildingName LIKE :buildingNoOrName) AND (:requestTypeFlg is null or t.requestType IN :requestType) AND (:requestOverview is null or t.requestOverview LIKE :requestOverview) AND (:facilityLedgerNo IS NULL OR mfc.facilityLedgerNo LIKE :facilityLedgerNo) AND (:facilityName IS NULL OR mfc.facilityName LIKE :facilityName) AND (:facilityLedgerNoOrName IS NULL OR mfc.facilityLedgerNo LIKE :facilityLedgerNoOrName OR mfc.facilityName LIKE :facilityLedgerNoOrName) AND t.delFlg <>'1' AND tb.buildingDelPersonId IS NULL AND ((:buildingTenant is null) OR (:buildingTenant = tb.buildingType) ) AND (:prefectureCdFlg is null or mp.prefectureCd IN :prefectureCd) AND (:parentGroupId IS NULL OR tbg.id.parentGroupId = :parentGroupId) AND (:childGroupId IS NULL OR tbg.id.childGroupId = :childGroupId) AND tb.delFlg <>'1'

named-query.name: TMaintenanceRequest.findJoinForBuildingCountWithBuildingDivision
named-query.query: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT t) FROM TMaintenanceRequest t INNER JOIN t.TMaintenanceRequestHistories tmrh INNER JOIN tmrh.TMaintenanceFacilities tmf INNER JOIN tmf.MFacility mfc INNER JOIN mfc.TBuilding tb INNER JOIN tb.MPrefecture mp INNER JOIN tb.TBuildingPersons tbp INNER JOIN tb.MCorp mc LEFT OUTER JOIN tb.TBuildingGroups tbg ON tbg.delFlg = 0 LEFT OUTER JOIN tbg.MChildGroup cg ON cg.delFlg = 0 LEFT OUTER JOIN cg.MParentGroup pg ON pg.delFlg = 0 WHERE (:maintenanceManageNo is null or t.maintenanceManageNo = :maintenanceManageNo) AND (:requestDateFrFlg is null or t.requestDate >= :requestDateFr) AND (:requestDateToFlg is null or t.requestDate <= :requestDateTo) AND (:executeDateFrFlg is null or t.executePlanStartDate >= :executeDateFr) AND (:executeDateToFlg is null or t.executePlanStartDate <= :executeDateTo) AND (:completionDateFrFlg is null or t.completionDate >= :completionDateFr) AND (:completionDateToFlg is null or t.completionDate <= :completionDateTo) AND (:requestStatusFlg is null or t.requestStatus IN :requestStatus) AND (:corpId is null or mc.corpId = :corpId) AND (:corpName is null or mc.corpName LIKE :corpName) AND (:corpIdOrName is null or mc.corpId LIKE :corpIdOrName or mc.corpName LIKE :corpIdOrName) AND (:buildingCorpId is null or tb.id.corpId = :buildingCorpId) AND (:buildingId is null or tb.id.buildingId = :buildingId) AND (:buildingNo is null or tb.buildingNo LIKE :buildingNo) AND (:buildingName is null or tb.buildingName LIKE :buildingName) AND (:divisionCorpId is null or tb.divisionCorpId = :divisionCorpId) AND (:divisionBuildingId is null or tb.divisionBuildingId = :divisionBuildingId) AND (:buildingNoOrName is null or tb.buildingNo LIKE :buildingNoOrName or tb.buildingName LIKE :buildingNoOrName) AND (:requestTypeFlg is null or t.requestType IN :requestType) AND (:requestOverview is null or t.requestOverview LIKE :requestOverview) AND (:facilityLedgerNo IS NULL OR mfc.facilityLedgerNo LIKE :facilityLedgerNo) AND (:facilityName IS NULL OR mfc.facilityName LIKE :facilityName) AND (:facilityLedgerNoOrName IS NULL OR mfc.facilityLedgerNo LIKE :facilityLedgerNoOrName OR mfc.facilityName LIKE :facilityLedgerNoOrName) AND (:personCorpId IS NULL OR tbp.id.personCorpId =:personCorpId) AND (:personId IS NULL OR tbp.id.personId =:personId) AND (tbp.delFlg = 0) AND tb.buildingDelPersonId IS NULL AND ((:buildingTenant is null) OR (:buildingTenant = tb.buildingType) ) AND (:prefectureCdFlg is null or mp.prefectureCd IN :prefectureCd) AND (:parentGroupId IS NULL OR tbg.id.parentGroupId = :parentGroupId) AND (:childGroupId IS NULL OR tbg.id.childGroupId = :childGroupId) AND t.delFlg <>'1' AND tb.delFlg <>'1'

named-query.name: TMaintenanceRequest.findJoinForCorpCountWithBuildingDivision
named-query.query: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT t) FROM TMaintenanceRequest t INNER JOIN t.TMaintenanceRequestHistories tmrh INNER JOIN tmrh.TMaintenanceFacilities tmf INNER JOIN tmf.MFacility mfc INNER JOIN mfc.TBuilding tb INNER JOIN tb.MPrefecture mp INNER JOIN tb.MCorp mc INNER JOIN mc.MCorpPersons mcp LEFT OUTER JOIN tb.TBuildingGroups tbg ON tbg.delFlg = 0 LEFT OUTER JOIN tbg.MChildGroup cg ON cg.delFlg = 0 LEFT OUTER JOIN cg.MParentGroup pg ON pg.delFlg = 0 WHERE (:maintenanceManageNo is null or t.maintenanceManageNo = :maintenanceManageNo) AND (:requestDateFrFlg is null or t.requestDate >= :requestDateFr) AND (:requestDateToFlg is null or t.requestDate <= :requestDateTo) AND (:executeDateFrFlg is null or t.executePlanStartDate >= :executeDateFr) AND (:executeDateToFlg is null or t.executePlanStartDate <= :executeDateTo) AND (:completionDateFrFlg is null or t.completionDate >= :completionDateFr) AND (:completionDateToFlg is null or t.completionDate <= :completionDateTo) AND (:requestStatusFlg is null or t.requestStatus IN :requestStatus) AND (:corpId is null or mc.corpId = :corpId) AND (:corpName is null or mc.corpName LIKE :corpName) AND (:corpIdOrName is null or mc.corpId LIKE :corpIdOrName or mc.corpName LIKE :corpIdOrName) AND (:buildingCorpId is null or tb.id.corpId = :buildingCorpId) AND (:buildingId is null or tb.id.buildingId = :buildingId) AND (:buildingNo is null or tb.buildingNo LIKE :buildingNo) AND (:buildingName is null or tb.buildingName LIKE :buildingName) AND (:divisionCorpId is null or tb.divisionCorpId = :divisionCorpId) AND (:divisionBuildingId is null or tb.divisionBuildingId = :divisionBuildingId) AND (:buildingNoOrName is null or tb.buildingNo LIKE :buildingNoOrName or tb.buildingName LIKE :buildingNoOrName) AND (:requestTypeFlg is null or t.requestType IN :requestType) AND (:requestOverview is null or t.requestOverview LIKE :requestOverview) AND (:facilityLedgerNo IS NULL OR mfc.facilityLedgerNo LIKE :facilityLedgerNo) AND (:facilityName IS NULL OR mfc.facilityName LIKE :facilityName) AND (:facilityLedgerNoOrName IS NULL OR mfc.facilityLedgerNo LIKE :facilityLedgerNoOrName OR mfc.facilityName LIKE :facilityLedgerNoOrName) AND (:personCorpId IS NULL OR mcp.id.personCorpId =:personCorpId) AND (:personId IS NULL OR mcp.id.personId =:personId) AND (:personId IS NULL OR mcp.authorityType ='0') AND (mcp.delFlg = 0) AND t.delFlg <>'1' AND tb.buildingDelPersonId IS NULL AND ((:buildingTenant is null) OR (:buildingTenant = tb.buildingType) ) AND (:prefectureCdFlg is null or mp.prefectureCd IN :prefectureCd) AND (:parentGroupId IS NULL OR tbg.id.parentGroupId = :parentGroupId) AND (:childGroupId IS NULL OR tbg.id.childGroupId = :childGroupId) AND tb.delFlg <>'1'

named-query.name: TMaintenanceRequest.findJoinWithBuildingDivision
named-query.query: SELECT t FROM TMaintenanceRequest t INNER JOIN t.TMaintenanceRequestHistories tmrh INNER JOIN tmrh.TMaintenanceFacilities tmf INNER JOIN tmf.MFacility mfc INNER JOIN mfc.TBuilding tb INNER JOIN tb.MPrefecture mp INNER JOIN tb.MCorp mc LEFT OUTER JOIN tb.TBuildingGroups tbg ON tbg.delFlg = 0 LEFT OUTER JOIN tbg.MChildGroup cg ON cg.delFlg = 0 LEFT OUTER JOIN cg.MParentGroup pg ON pg.delFlg = 0 WHERE (:maintenanceManageNo is null or t.maintenanceManageNo = :maintenanceManageNo) AND (:requestDateFrFlg is null or t.requestDate >= :requestDateFr) AND (:requestDateToFlg is null or t.requestDate <= :requestDateTo) AND (:executeDateFrFlg is null or t.executePlanStartDate >= :executeDateFr) AND (:executeDateToFlg is null or t.executePlanStartDate <= :executeDateTo) AND (:completionDateFrFlg is null or t.completionDate >= :completionDateFr) AND (:completionDateToFlg is null or t.completionDate <= :completionDateTo) AND (:requestStatusFlg is null or t.requestStatus IN :requestStatus) AND (:corpId is null or mc.corpId = :corpId) AND (:corpName is null or mc.corpName LIKE :corpName) AND (:corpIdOrName is null or mc.corpId LIKE :corpIdOrName or mc.corpName LIKE :corpIdOrName) AND (:buildingCorpId is null or tb.id.corpId = :buildingCorpId) AND (:buildingId is null or tb.id.buildingId = :buildingId) AND (:buildingNo is null or tb.buildingNo LIKE :buildingNo) AND (:buildingName is null or tb.buildingName LIKE :buildingName) AND (:buildingNoOrName is null or tb.buildingNo LIKE :buildingNoOrName or tb.buildingName LIKE :buildingNoOrName) AND (:divisionCorpId is null or tb.divisionCorpId = :divisionCorpId) AND (:divisionBuildingId is null or tb.divisionBuildingId = :divisionBuildingId) AND (:requestTypeFlg is null or t.requestType IN :requestType) AND (:requestOverview is null or t.requestOverview LIKE :requestOverview) AND (:facilityLedgerNo IS NULL OR mfc.facilityLedgerNo LIKE :facilityLedgerNo) AND (:facilityName IS NULL OR mfc.facilityName LIKE :facilityName) AND (:facilityLedgerNoOrName IS NULL OR mfc.facilityLedgerNo LIKE :facilityLedgerNoOrName OR mfc.facilityName LIKE :facilityLedgerNoOrName) AND t.delFlg <>'1' AND tb.buildingDelPersonId IS NULL AND ((:buildingTenant is null) OR (:buildingTenant = tb.buildingType) ) AND (:prefectureCdFlg is null or mp.prefectureCd IN :prefectureCd) AND (:parentGroupId IS NULL OR tbg.id.parentGroupId = :parentGroupId) AND (:childGroupId IS NULL OR tbg.id.childGroupId = :childGroupId) AND tb.delFlg <>'1' ORDER BY t.maintenanceManageNo DESC

named-query.name: TMaintenanceRequest.findJoinForBuildingWithBuildingDivision
named-query.query: SELECT t FROM TMaintenanceRequest t INNER JOIN t.TMaintenanceRequestHistories tmrh INNER JOIN tmrh.TMaintenanceFacilities tmf INNER JOIN tmf.MFacility mfc INNER JOIN mfc.TBuilding tb INNER JOIN tb.MPrefecture mp INNER JOIN tb.TBuildingPersons tbp INNER JOIN tb.MCorp mc LEFT OUTER JOIN tb.TBuildingGroups tbg ON tbg.delFlg = 0 LEFT OUTER JOIN tbg.MChildGroup cg ON cg.delFlg = 0 LEFT OUTER JOIN cg.MParentGroup pg ON pg.delFlg = 0 WHERE (:maintenanceManageNo is null or t.maintenanceManageNo = :maintenanceManageNo) AND (:requestDateFrFlg is null or t.requestDate >= :requestDateFr) AND (:requestDateToFlg is null or t.requestDate <= :requestDateTo) AND (:executeDateFrFlg is null or t.executePlanStartDate >= :executeDateFr) AND (:executeDateToFlg is null or t.executePlanStartDate <= :executeDateTo) AND (:completionDateFrFlg is null or t.completionDate >= :completionDateFr) AND (:completionDateToFlg is null or t.completionDate <= :completionDateTo) AND (:requestStatusFlg is null or t.requestStatus IN :requestStatus) AND (:corpId is null or mc.corpId = :corpId) AND (:corpName is null or mc.corpName LIKE :corpName) AND (:corpIdOrName is null or mc.corpId LIKE :corpIdOrName or mc.corpName LIKE :corpIdOrName) AND (:buildingCorpId is null or tb.id.corpId = :buildingCorpId) AND (:buildingId is null or tb.id.buildingId = :buildingId) AND (:buildingNo is null or tb.buildingNo LIKE :buildingNo) AND (:buildingName is null or tb.buildingName LIKE :buildingName) AND (:divisionCorpId is null or tb.divisionCorpId = :divisionCorpId) AND (:divisionBuildingId is null or tb.divisionBuildingId = :divisionBuildingId) AND (:buildingNoOrName is null or tb.buildingNo LIKE :buildingNoOrName or tb.buildingName LIKE :buildingNoOrName) AND (:requestTypeFlg is null or t.requestType IN :requestType) AND (:requestOverview is null or t.requestOverview LIKE :requestOverview) AND (:facilityLedgerNo IS NULL OR mfc.facilityLedgerNo LIKE :facilityLedgerNo) AND (:facilityName IS NULL OR mfc.facilityName LIKE :facilityName) AND (:facilityLedgerNoOrName IS NULL OR mfc.facilityLedgerNo LIKE :facilityLedgerNoOrName OR mfc.facilityName LIKE :facilityLedgerNoOrName) AND (:personCorpId IS NULL OR tbp.id.personCorpId =:personCorpId) AND (:personId IS NULL OR tbp.id.personId =:personId) AND (tbp.delFlg = 0) AND tb.buildingDelPersonId IS NULL AND ((:buildingTenant is null) OR (:buildingTenant = tb.buildingType) ) AND (:prefectureCdFlg is null or mp.prefectureCd IN :prefectureCd) AND (:parentGroupId IS NULL OR tbg.id.parentGroupId = :parentGroupId) AND (:childGroupId IS NULL OR tbg.id.childGroupId = :childGroupId) AND t.delFlg <>'1' AND tb.delFlg <>'1' ORDER BY t.maintenanceManageNo DESC

named-query.name: TMaintenanceRequest.findJoinForCorpWithBuildingDivision
named-query.query: SELECT t FROM TMaintenanceRequest t INNER JOIN t.TMaintenanceRequestHistories tmrh INNER JOIN tmrh.TMaintenanceFacilities tmf INNER JOIN tmf.MFacility mfc INNER JOIN mfc.TBuilding tb INNER JOIN tb.MPrefecture mp INNER JOIN tb.MCorp mc INNER JOIN mc.MCorpPersons mcp LEFT OUTER JOIN tb.TBuildingGroups tbg ON tbg.delFlg = 0 LEFT OUTER JOIN tbg.MChildGroup cg ON cg.delFlg = 0 LEFT OUTER JOIN cg.MParentGroup pg ON pg.delFlg = 0 WHERE (:maintenanceManageNo is null or t.maintenanceManageNo = :maintenanceManageNo) AND (:requestDateFrFlg is null or t.requestDate >= :requestDateFr) AND (:requestDateToFlg is null or t.requestDate <= :requestDateTo) AND (:executeDateFrFlg is null or t.executePlanStartDate >= :executeDateFr) AND (:executeDateToFlg is null or t.executePlanStartDate <= :executeDateTo) AND (:completionDateFrFlg is null or t.completionDate >= :completionDateFr) AND (:completionDateToFlg is null or t.completionDate <= :completionDateTo) AND (:requestStatusFlg is null or t.requestStatus IN :requestStatus) AND (:corpId is null or mc.corpId = :corpId) AND (:corpName is null or mc.corpName LIKE :corpName) AND (:corpIdOrName is null or mc.corpId LIKE :corpIdOrName or mc.corpName LIKE :corpIdOrName) AND (:buildingCorpId is null or tb.id.corpId = :buildingCorpId) AND (:buildingId is null or tb.id.buildingId = :buildingId) AND (:buildingNo is null or tb.buildingNo LIKE :buildingNo) AND (:buildingName is null or tb.buildingName LIKE :buildingName) AND (:divisionCorpId is null or tb.divisionCorpId = :divisionCorpId) AND (:divisionBuildingId is null or tb.divisionBuildingId = :divisionBuildingId) AND (:buildingNoOrName is null or tb.buildingNo LIKE :buildingNoOrName or tb.buildingName LIKE :buildingNoOrName) AND (:requestTypeFlg is null or t.requestType IN :requestType) AND (:requestOverview is null or t.requestOverview LIKE :requestOverview) AND (:facilityLedgerNo IS NULL OR mfc.facilityLedgerNo LIKE :facilityLedgerNo) AND (:facilityName IS NULL OR mfc.facilityName LIKE :facilityName) AND (:facilityLedgerNoOrName IS NULL OR mfc.facilityLedgerNo LIKE :facilityLedgerNoOrName OR mfc.facilityName LIKE :facilityLedgerNoOrName) AND (:personCorpId IS NULL OR mcp.id.personCorpId =:personCorpId) AND (:personId IS NULL OR mcp.id.personId =:personId) AND (:personId IS NULL OR mcp.authorityType ='0') AND (mcp.delFlg = 0) AND t.delFlg <>'1' AND tb.buildingDelPersonId IS NULL AND ((:buildingTenant is null) OR (:buildingTenant = tb.buildingType) ) AND (:prefectureCdFlg is null or mp.prefectureCd IN :prefectureCd) AND (:parentGroupId IS NULL OR tbg.id.parentGroupId = :parentGroupId) AND (:childGroupId IS NULL OR tbg.id.childGroupId = :childGroupId) AND tb.delFlg <>'1' ORDER BY t.maintenanceManageNo DESC

named-query.name: TBuilding.energyInputSearchWithBuildingDivision
named-query.query: SELECT DISTINCT t FROM TBuilding t LEFT OUTER JOIN FETCH t.TBuildingPersons p LEFT OUTER JOIN FETCH p.MPerson mp LEFT JOIN FETCH t.MMunicipality mm LEFT JOIN FETCH mm.MRegionType LEFT OUTER JOIN t.TBuildingGroups tbg ON tbg.delFlg = 0 LEFT OUTER JOIN tbg.MChildGroup cg ON cg.delFlg = 0 LEFT OUTER JOIN cg.MParentGroup pg ON pg.delFlg = 0 WHERE t.id.corpId =:corpId AND (:buildingId IS NULL OR t.id.buildingId =:buildingId) AND (:prefectureCdFlg is null or t.MPrefecture.prefectureCd IN :prefectureCd) AND ((:buildingNo IS NULL OR t.buildingNo LIKE :buildingNo) OR (:buildingName IS NULL OR t.buildingName LIKE :buildingName)) AND (:personId IS NULL OR (p.id.personId LIKE :personId AND p.delFlg = 0 AND p.id.personCorpId = :corpId)) AND (:personName IS NULL OR (mp.personName LIKE :personName AND p.delFlg = 0 AND p.id.personCorpId = :corpId)) AND (:delFlg IS NULL OR t.delFlg =:delFlg) AND (:totalStartYmString IS NULL OR (t.totalEndYm IS NULL OR t.totalEndYm >=:totalStartYm)) AND (:totalEndYmString IS NULL OR (t.totalEndYm IS NOT NULL AND t.totalEndYm <:totalEndYm)) AND (:buildingDelPersonId IS NULL OR t.buildingDelPersonId IS NOT NULL) AND (:divisionCorpId IS NULL OR t.divisionCorpId = :divisionCorpId) AND (:divisionBuildingId IS NULL OR t.divisionBuildingId = :divisionBuildingId) AND ( (:buildingTenant = t.buildingType) OR (:buildingTenant is null) ) AND (:parentGroupId IS NULL OR tbg.id.parentGroupId = :parentGroupId) AND (:childGroupId IS NULL OR tbg.id.childGroupId = :childGroupId) ORDER BY t.buildingNo, p.id.personId

named-query.name: TBuilding.findJoinForPersoninBuilding
named-query.query: SELECT distinct j FROM TBuilding j LEFT OUTER JOIN j.MPrefecture m LEFT OUTER JOIN j.TBuildingGroups tbg ON tbg.delFlg = 0 LEFT OUTER JOIN tbg.MChildGroup cg ON cg.delFlg = 0 LEFT OUTER JOIN cg.MParentGroup pg ON pg.delFlg = 0 WHERE j.id.corpId =:corpId AND (:buildingNo is null or j.buildingNo like :buildingNo) AND (:buildingName is null or j.buildingName like :buildingName) AND (:buildingNoOrName is null or j.buildingNo like :buildingNoOrName or j.buildingName like :buildingNoOrName) AND (:prefectureCdFlg is null or m.prefectureCd IN :prefectureCd) AND (:nowflg is null or (:nowDate <= j.totalEndYm or j.totalEndYm IS NULL ) and j.buildingDelDate IS NULL ) AND (:endflg is null or (:nowDate > j.totalEndYm )) AND (:delflg IS NULL AND (j.buildingDelDate IS NULL OR :notdelflg IS NOT NULL ) OR (:delflg IS NOT NULL AND j.buildingDelDate IS NOT NULL ) ) AND ( (:buildingTenant is null) OR (:buildingTenant = j.buildingType) ) AND (:parentGroupId IS NULL OR tbg.id.parentGroupId = :parentGroupId) AND (:childGroupId IS NULL OR tbg.id.childGroupId = :childGroupId) AND j.delFlg = 0 ORDER BY j.buildingNo ASC

named-query.name: TBuilding.findJoinForPersoninBuildingPerson
named-query.query: SELECT distinct j FROM TBuilding j LEFT OUTER JOIN j.MPrefecture m INNER JOIN j.TBuildingPersons tbp LEFT OUTER JOIN j.TBuildingGroups tbg ON tbg.delFlg = 0 LEFT OUTER JOIN tbg.MChildGroup cg ON cg.delFlg = 0 LEFT OUTER JOIN cg.MParentGroup pg ON pg.delFlg = 0 WHERE j.id.corpId =:corpId AND (:buildingNo is null or j.buildingNo like :buildingNo) AND (:buildingName is null or j.buildingName like :buildingName) AND (:buildingNoOrName is null or j.buildingNo like :buildingNoOrName or j.buildingName like :buildingNoOrName) AND (:prefectureCdFlg is null or m.prefectureCd IN :prefectureCd) AND (:nowflg is null or (:nowDate <= j.totalEndYm or j.totalEndYm IS NULL ) and j.buildingDelDate IS NULL ) AND (:endflg is null or (:nowDate > j.totalEndYm )) AND (:delflg IS NULL AND (j.buildingDelDate IS NULL OR :notdelflg IS NOT NULL ) OR (:delflg IS NOT NULL AND j.buildingDelDate IS NOT NULL ) ) AND j.delFlg = 0 AND (tbp.id.personId = :authorityPersonId) AND (tbp.id.personCorpId = :authorityCorpId) AND ((:buildingTenant is null) OR (:buildingTenant = j.buildingType) ) AND (:parentGroupId IS NULL OR tbg.id.parentGroupId = :parentGroupId) AND (:childGroupId IS NULL OR tbg.id.childGroupId = :childGroupId) AND (tbp.delFlg = 0) ORDER BY j.buildingNo ASC

named-query.name: TBuilding.findJoinForBuildingGroupWithBuildingDivision
named-query.query: SELECT j FROM TBuilding j LEFT OUTER JOIN j.MPrefecture m WHERE j.id.corpId =:corpId AND (:buildingNo is null or j.buildingNo like :buildingNo) AND (:buildingName is null or j.buildingName like :buildingName) AND (:buildingNoOrName is null or j.buildingNo like :buildingNoOrName or j.buildingName like :buildingNoOrName) AND (:prefectureCdFlg is null or m.prefectureCd IN :prefectureCd) AND (:nyukyoTypeCd is null or j.nyukyoTypeCd =:nyukyoTypeCd) AND (:nowflg is null or (:nowDate <= j.totalEndYm or j.totalEndYm IS NULL ) and j.buildingDelDate IS NULL ) AND (:endflg is null or (:nowDate > j.totalEndYm )) AND (:delflg IS NULL AND (j.buildingDelDate IS NULL OR :notdelflg IS NOT NULL ) OR (:delflg IS NOT NULL AND j.buildingDelDate IS NOT NULL ) ) AND ((:buildingTenant is null) OR (:buildingTenant = j.buildingType) ) AND j.delFlg = 0 ORDER BY j.buildingNo ASC

named-query.name: TBuilding.energyInputSearch
named-query.query: SELECT DISTINCT t FROM TBuilding t LEFT OUTER JOIN FETCH t.TBuildingPersons p LEFT OUTER JOIN FETCH p.MPerson mp LEFT JOIN FETCH t.MMunicipality mm LEFT JOIN FETCH mm.MRegionType WHERE t.id.corpId =:corpId AND (:prefectureCd IS NULL OR t.MPrefecture.prefectureCd =:prefectureCd) AND ((:buildingNo IS NULL OR t.buildingNo LIKE :buildingNo) OR (:buildingName IS NULL OR t.buildingName LIKE :buildingName)) AND (:personId IS NULL OR (p.id.personId LIKE :personId AND p.delFlg = 0 AND p.id.personCorpId = :corpId)) AND (:personName IS NULL OR (mp.personName LIKE :personName AND p.delFlg = 0 AND p.id.personCorpId = :corpId)) AND (:delFlg IS NULL OR t.delFlg =:delFlg) AND (:totalStartYmString IS NULL OR (t.totalEndYm IS NULL OR t.totalEndYm >=:totalStartYm)) AND (:totalEndYmString IS NULL OR (t.totalEndYm IS NOT NULL AND t.totalEndYm <:totalEndYm)) AND (:buildingDelPersonId IS NULL OR t.buildingDelPersonId IS NOT NULL) AND (:buildingDelPersonId IS NOT NULL OR t.buildingDelPersonId IS NULL) AND ((:buildingTenant is null) OR (:buildingTenant = t.buildingType) ) ORDER BY t.buildingNo, p.id.personId

named-query.name: TBuilding.findExcelForFreonWithBuildingTerm
named-query.query: SELECT b FROM TBuilding b WHERE (:corpId IS NULL OR b.id.corpId =:corpId) AND b.freonDischargeOffice = 1 AND b.delFlg = 0 AND b.buildingDelDate IS NULL AND b.totalStartYm <= :toDate AND (b.totalEndYm >= :fromDate OR b.totalEndYm IS NULL) ORDER BY b.id.corpId ASC, b.MPrefecture.prefectureCd ASC, b.buildingNo ASC

named-query.name: TFreonFillingReport.findExcelWithBuildingTerm
named-query.query: SELECT t FROM TFreonFillingReport t LEFT JOIN t.MFacility mf LEFT JOIN mf.TBuilding tb LEFT JOIN tb.MPrefecture mp LEFT JOIN mf.MRefrigerant mr LEFT JOIN mr.MRefrigerantYearGwps mryg ON mryg.id.year = :year WHERE t.id.corpId = :corpId AND (t.fillingDate BETWEEN :fromDate AND :toDate AND (t.fillingDate >= tb.totalStartYm AND (tb.totalEndYm IS NULL OR t.fillingDate <= DATE_TRUNC('month',to_timestamp(to_char(tb.totalEndYm, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD hh:mm:ss') + '1 months') + '-1 days'))) AND t.delFlg = 0 AND mf.delFlg = 0 AND tb.delFlg = 0 AND tb.buildingDelDate IS NULL AND tb.totalStartYm < :toDate AND ( tb.totalEndYm IS NULL OR tb.totalEndYm > :fromDate) ORDER BY t.id.corpId, t.fillingDate, t.MFacility.TBuilding.MPrefecture.prefectureCd, t.MFacility.TBuilding.buildingNo,t.MFacility.MRefrigerant.displayOrder, t.id.maintenanceId, t.id.maintenanceRequestId, t.id.facilityId, t.id.freonFillingReportId

named-query.name: TFreonFillingReport.findFreonInputStateListWithBuildingTerm
named-query.query: SELECT DISTINCT t FROM TFreonFillingReport t LEFT JOIN t.MFacility mf LEFT JOIN mf.TBuilding tb LEFT JOIN mf.MFacilityKinds mfk LEFT JOIN mfk.MCorpFacilityKind mc LEFT JOIN mc.MFacilitySmallKind mfs LEFT JOIN mfs.MFacilityBigKind mfg LEFT JOIN mf.MRefrigerant mr WHERE t.id.corpId = :corpId AND t.delFlg = :delFlg AND mf.delFlg = :delFlg AND tb.delFlg = :delFlg AND tb.buildingDelDate IS NULL AND mfk.delFlg = :delFlg AND (t.fillingDate >= tb.totalStartYm AND (tb.totalEndYm IS NULL OR t.fillingDate <= DATE_TRUNC('month',to_timestamp(to_char(tb.totalEndYm, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD hh:mm:ss') + '1 months') + '-1 days')) ORDER BY t.updateDate DESC

named-query.name: MEnergy.findByEngTypeCdSupplyAreaSupplyCompany
named-query.query: SELECT m FROM MEnergy m INNER JOIN m.id WHERE m.id.engTypeCd =:engTypeCd AND (:supplyArea IS NULL OR m.supplyArea LIKE :supplyArea OR m.supplyArea IS NULL) AND (:supplyCompany IS NULL OR m.supplyCompany LIKE :supplyCompany) ORDER BY m.displayOrder ASC
